briefTitle: Study to Evaluate Surgical Excision Margins in Malignant Breast Lumpectomies With the PEAK PlasmaBlade
officialTitle: A Prospective, Controlled Study To Evaluate Surgical Excision Margins in Malignant Breast Lumpectomies With the PEAK PlasmaBlade Compared to Traditional Electrosurgery
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To compare the thermal injury artifact produced by traditional electrosurgery vs. the PEAK PlasmaBlade by intensive pathologic analysis both by gross inspection, touch imprint, and permanent histologic analysis.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

* Women or men with an established diagnosis of an invasive ductal carcinoma
* Women or men with tumors \> 1cm
* Women undergoing Breast Conservation Operations
* Women or men may have had prior chemotherapy as long as their treatment was completed \>2 weeks prior to enrollment with recovery from any toxicities

Exclusion Criteria

* No established diagnosis of breast cancer
* Women or men with tumors \<1 cm
* Women or men undergoing total mastectomy
* Women or men who have had prior radiation
